channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Heron (Incubating)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Heron (Incubating)

item.title: CVE-2021-42010|2024-08-04T03:22:25.639Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20heron%20%28incubating%29
item.description: Heron versions <= 0.20.4-incubating allows CRLF log injection because of the lack of escaping in the log statements. Please update to version 0.20.5-incubating which addresses this issue.
